page.title: 17AMENITIES
page.content:
As part of our Domesday project we are extracting part of Mr G Steven's report on the Bower Parish dated 1952 to show how ;the amenities of the area havae changed over the past 33 years: Water Supply "With the exception of a small group of houses in Gillock, practically the whole parish continues to carry its water from the most convenient well. A county council regional water scheme is at present under construction and should serve the whole parish by 1955."
